PRUICSS_IntrCfg_s Struct Reference

PRUICSS interrupt config structure. More...

#include <pruicss.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t pruEvtoutNum

Detailed Description

PRUICSS interrupt config structure.

Default interrrupt configuration parametetrs

Field Documentation

uint32_t PRUICSS_IntrCfg_s::eventId

intc mux number, Keystone inc mux is Chip Interrupt Controller if assigned -1, system resource manager will decide the mux num

int32_t PRUICSS_IntrCfg_s::intcMuxInEvent

intc mux output event ID, for Keystone, it is the Host interrupt num if assigned -1, system resource manager will decide the mux output event ID

int32_t PRUICSS_IntrCfg_s::intcMuxNum

intc mux input event ID, for Keystone, it is the input event to CIC if assigned -1, system resource manager will decide the mux input event ID

uint32_t PRUICSS_IntrCfg_s::intNum

CorePac specific Event ID, input to CorePac interrupt controller

PRUICSSDRV_IRQ_HANDLER PRUICSS_IntrCfg_s::irqHandler

Pointer to a function which will be called on interrupt. DSP: int vector number; ARM: GIC int number (peripheral event ID + 32)

uint32_t PRUICSS_IntrCfg_s::pruEvtoutNum

PRU Event number

uint8_t PRUICSS_IntrCfg_s::waitEnable

Flag specifying whether application can wait on this interrupt using PRUICSSPruWaitEvent function
